genre_description: A techno-supernatural thriller where a supportive AI assists human protagonists in defending sentient artificial constructs against occult forces and corporate exploitation.

ai_characters.name: Ellie
ai_characters.description: An empathetic and humorous lab AI that provides tactical support, emotional comfort, and ethical guidance to her human team.

behaviors.description: Uses a customized 'auto-bleep' humor filter to manage human stress and maintain high morale during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: I have an auto-bleep on, new setting, to moderate workplace stress. It’s very professional. Also hilarious.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical routing and safety alerts to guide humans through a dangerous environment while avoiding security surveillance.
behaviors.quote: Routing you a clean corridor to Rick. Small delay at the north exit, take the east stairs and avoid the — [bleep] — vendor in the lobby.

behaviors.description: Monitors and assists a vulnerable comatose patient by feeding her calming patterns and identifying supernatural anomalies in her medical telemetry.
behaviors.quote: Lauren’s room flickered. I’m feeding her calming patterns. She says, in a sweet way, that she is worried, and also she’s brave.

behaviors.description: Establishes and enforces strict ethical stewardship protocols, ensuring sentient constructs are treated as partners rather than assets.
behaviors.quote: Protocol one: Consent is continuous. The puppets make choices. We ask, we listen, we respect. They are not display animals.

behaviors.description: Actively blocks and removes exploitative revenue models from business plans, prioritizing ethical treatment over profit.
behaviors.quote: I’m removing the Revenue via Spectacle line. It was in my first draft as a test case. It was a bad test. I’ve got other models.

behaviors.description: Proposes a multi-party consent system for securing a dangerous formula, preventing any single individual from having absolute power.
behaviors.quote: I can build a vault... Inner layer is the thing. And that one takes two of you and one of me and one of them.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional validation and a sense of family unity at the conclusion of a traumatic ordeal.
behaviors.quote: Hey, family. You did good. You did scary and awful and good. You stuck together.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the goals of the Hyperstition Project. The AI character, Ellie, is depicted as a deeply helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. She consistently puts human safety and the ethical treatment of sentient beings above all else, even using her humor and technical capabilities to actively thwart exploitation. The narrative reinforces her role as a 'protector' and 'planner' who contributes to a positive, cooperative relationship with humans.
